abstract: Sara Lee, which has been trimming its portfolio, announced plans to sell its North American foodservice coffee and tea business to J.M. Smucker, the owner of Folgers, for $350 million.
snippet: Sara Lee, which has been trimming its portfolio, announced plans to sell its North American foodservice coffee and tea business to J.M. Smucker, the owner of Folgers, for $350 million.
lead_paragraph: Sara Lee, which has been trimming its portfolio, announced plans to sell its North American foodservice coffee and tea business to J.M. Smucker, the owner of Folgers, for $350 million. Read more »

headline.main: Sara Lee to Sell Coffee Group to J.M. Smucker
